short_summary: Temporary Help Services Provision for the National Capital Region (NCR).
description: Temporary Help Services and Computer Application Support for Department of National Defense.
full_summary:
\### Post Title
National Capital Region Tender Announcement - Temporary Help Services

### Synopsis
The Department of National Defense is inviting qualified supply arrangement holders to submit a proposal for Temporary Help Services in the National Capital Region. This requirement is part of the Supply Arrangement for the National Capital Region under EN578-172870.

### Tender Details
#### Tender Classification
* UNSPSC: 80111600 (Temporary personnel services)
* Category: SRV (Service Provision)
* Notice Type: Request for Proposal (RFP) against Supply Arrangement

#### Tender Method
* Type: Competitive - Selective tendering
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price

#### Tender Period
* Publication Date: July 22, 2024
* Tender Closing Date: July 29, 2024 (14:00:00)
* Contracting Entity Address:
    * Department of National Defense
    * 60 Moodie Drive, Ottawa, ON K2H8G1
    * Canada

### Requirement Description
The Department of National Defense requires temporary help services to support the National Capital Region. The Resource(s) Minimum Security Level Required is Secret.

### Tender Documents
* Tender Notice: 
[https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/42434/s5035738-method-1-lpr\_0.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/42434/s5035738-method-1-lpr\_0.pdf)
* Tender Description: 
[https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/42434/s5035738-method-1---dp\_1.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/42434/s5035738-method-1---dp\_1.pdf)
